Package CAMSv2

Class Student

java.lang.Object
CAMSv2.User
CAMSv2.Student
Direct Known Subclasses:
CampCommitteeMember
public class Student extends User
This Student class represent a Student user registered in the system.
Since:
13-11-2023

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(String name, String emailID, UserGroup faculty, String password, Role role)
      Constructor for the Student class. It initializes the student's name, email ID, faculty, password, role, enquiries, and registered camps.
      Parameters:
      name - The student's name.
      emailID - The student's email ID.
      faculty - The faculty to which the student belongs.
      password - The student's password.
      role - The student's role.

    • canRegisterCamp

      public boolean canRegisterCamp(Camp camp)
      This method checks if the student can register for a given camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp to check.
      Returns:
      true if the student can register for the camp, false otherwise.

    • registerCampRole

      public boolean registerCampRole(Role role, Camp camp)
      Registers a student for a camp with a specific role.
      Parameters:
      role - The role to be assigned (e.g., CAMP_COMMITTEE_MEMBER or STUDENT).
      camp - The camp for which the student is registering.
      Returns:
      true if the registration is successful, false otherwise.

    • withdrawFromCamp

      public void withdrawFromCamp(Camp camp)
      This method withdraws a student from a given camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp to check. Blacklists the student from the given cmap and removes the student from the camp's student list. .

    • overlappingCampDates

      public boolean overlappingCampDates(Camp camp)
      Checks if the dates of the given camp overlap with any of the camps already registered by the student.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp to check for date overlap.
      Returns:
      true if there is an overlap, false otherwise.
